question: Is there any paper that explores using only an encoder-only masked language model for open-ended long text generation (such as story generation)?
answer_format: Your answer should be the title of the paper WITHOUT ANY EXPLANATION.

eval_kwargs.question: Is there any paper that explores using only an encoder-only masked language model for open-ended long text generation (such as story generation)?
eval_kwargs.reference_answer: Open-ended Long Text Generation via Masked Language Modeling
